paper_abstract: This paper proposes a new software system which provides algorithms for three variations of adaptive Fourier decomposition (AFD), including Core AFD, Cyclic AFD and Unwending AFD. The related time frequency distributions (TFDs) are also provided. Remarks are made for the algorithms design and development. The software system can be used to analyze any signal with finite energy.
paper_title: Adaptive Fourier decomposition and rational approximation - Part II: Software system design and development
